uvi.product_version: versions from v5.4.27 to before v5.4.128
uvi.description:
net: ll_temac: Fix TX BD buffer overwrite

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.128 by commit b6c0ab11c88fb016bfc85fa4f6f878f5f4263646, it was introduced in version v5.4.27 by commit 0c050d6554757f1be861b9f288406989c4053449. For more details please see the references link.
